info.name: Marginal sulcus
info.description: The marginal sulcus is the portion of the cingulate sulcus that separates the paracentral lobule from the precuneus.  It is AKA the marginal branch of the cingulate sulcus.
info.item: /Sections/Thick, Whole Brain/Sagittal & Parasagittal/Lateral to Medial/4 Parasag: Lat to Med
/Sections/Thick, Whole Brain/Sagittal & Parasagittal/Medial to Lateral/1 Parasag: Med to Lat
